author: Reuters
title: Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing drops $39 billion offer to buy London Stock Exchange
description: Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing said on Tuesday it will not make an offer for London Stock Exchange Group, a month after it unveiled a $39 billion takeover approach for the bourse operator.
content:
Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing said on Tuesday it will not make an offer for London Stock Exchange Group, a month after it unveiled a $39 billion takeover approach for the bourse operator.
 "The Board of HKEX continues to believe that a combination of LSEG… [+64 chars]
